评论详情: I had to go to a dress up function and didn’t want to spend much. This worked. I liked the dress more than the cover up and ended up changing out for a shawl I had. That said good buy for the money!

This is shaped like a bag. Meaning no shape. If they had gone for a roaring 20’s flapper dress it might have worked. But the product images show shaping in the waist and under chest areas.  The quality of construction and material is not in the realm of what was paid for it. $75? More like $30. Sequins were falling off left and right during my brief trying-on. I feel scammed frankly.

评论概述: The gold color of sequins is more like a rose gold
评论详情: Loved the fit of the dress and the style. But on the sleeves there were some sequins missing and thread pulls. Also the dress had a small stain on it! Almost like it had been worn. I had to go ahead and wear it as I didn't have enough time to find another dress. But I won't be wearing it again. Very disappointed with the quality.
The wrong color was sent. The description says it was Gold but it was a version of taupe or rose gold. I did like the style but needed a “Yellow” Gold.

I loved this dress - the fit was really nice, and the length was great (5'3" fell just at the knee).  It had just the right amount of sparkle and the option of the light cover was spot on.  Sadly, I had to return it as the gold was more of a champagne gold, not the more metallic bright gold I needed (specified for a themed party).  Still wanted to keep it, but I don't think I would have any occasion to wear it.  I would definitely recommend if you are looking for this type of dress.

This dress is absolutely gorgeous. I read all of the reviews. Mine came in a plastic bag NOT vacuum sealed. No wrinkles in the dress or very light weight jacket. I put it on and it felt like it was made for me. I got the rose gold which actually looks peachy. I am 5'3 and 122 pounds. Ordered medium. Never thought I would by a dress from Amazon especially as a mother of the bride. Love it

I don’t need formal attire very often so I did not want to pay $500 for a dress. This was an amazing value and I felt great when I wore it. The jacket is just ok but still nice (you can substitute a shawl or just wear the dress). The sequins did not fall off. True to size (medium) and very flattering. I bought a top from the same manufacturer and was equally pleased. In total, less the $100 for both!
I got the dress but the top shawl did not show up 😒
Loved the dress. Fit was great but returned because I found out the intended event was not as dressy.
I wore this dress to a New Year Eve party and it looked very nice on me.  I am 5'7" and the length was perfect .

评论详情: I love this dress, It fit nicely, and the over cape disguised some figure problems.

评论详情: The dress looked and fitted great.  The only issue I had was that the jacket wasn't the same color as dress like the picture showed.  The dress is burgundy color but the jacket was red

I bought this dress for my niece's wedding. I dress casual no matter the occasion.  I was invited to a formal wedding, and had no idea what to wear.  After searching online for 2 weeks, I seen hundreds of dresses.  On the last day ṭo order and receive before the big day, I chose this dress.  It fit perfect, it forms to your body comfortably and smooths fatty areas (Lol). I was very nervous and felt out of place ( this is only the 2 dress worn in my adult life). I arrived at the venue and several of the other guests complimented on how beautiful the dress is. Even though I'll probably never wear it again, it will hang in my closet forever. Material is stretchy and lightweight.
Took me 6 months to find the perfect dress for daughter’s wedding! Love this

I ordered the dress for a Christmas party and didn't understand why the fabric had a bad fall. The back of the dress was slightly lifted up looking odd from behind. A closer look shows how the making has been careless. They did not even straighten the fabric before using a machine to stitch the sequin lines on it. In more than one place the sequin lines run over pinched fabric. Straightening it is out of question.
Packaging caused wrinkles and needed cool/warm ironing on the cover jacket.  Received lots of compliments on this outfit.  I'm slightly fuller figured.
Comfortable and elegant. Great color selections. I was pleased with the quality of the material.

The dress is really nice. Good quality w/zipper in the back. The second piece that I’ll call the jacket for lack of a better word, gets easily wrinkled. So it gives an overall frumpy look especially in front where it needs to be more slick in order to keep the tapered look desired. The material just tends to flop around the chest area w/out any real form. Other than that. It’s a good 4 stars

评论概述: Nice dress, a few light weight cautions
评论详情: Arrives in a compressed air plastic bag, so there are wrinkles. Don't country on "ready to wear". Steaming didn't seem to work. It needs a low, low heat iron, with A DAMP PRESSING CLOTH between the garment and the iron.  You don't want to melt the sequins.  Purchased in the darker grey, and the jacket appear almost violet in some light, but is the appropriate grey in other light. It just depends. Fits true to size.  It is lovely, will wear for New Year's Eve Party.

Returning things here is very hard. Almost impossible. I would never order from here again. Twice I have gotten cheap looking dresses. I have wasted almost 300 dollars with this company.  Buyer beware.

I wore this dress in the Rose Gold color to my daughter’s wedding.  She picked it out for me.  It was beautiful!  It fit so well, very comfortable, looked so pretty and made me feel beautiful. I’m so happy with this dress and happy that my daughter chose it.

Undecided whether I will wear for the wedding or not, but keeping it anyway as I like it so much and the price is definitely right! Much less expensive than other dresses of similar quality. Has a little stretch and is much more comfortable than other dresses with sequins. Not itchy or scratchy at all as it is fully lined.
